column4: i have a usb device that came with windows software and windows drivers, can I use the drivers and the software through wine if I cant find any linux info on them?
what device do you need drivers for?
i doubt that will work.  i used vmware workstation with my pickit
i don't know about server version but usb works with the workstation and player version.  wikipedia claims virtualbox opensource edition doesn't support USB, btw
